data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rédei, Dávid (2018): A review of the species of the tribe Chorosomatini of China (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Rhopalidae). Zootaxa 4524 (3): 308-328, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4524.3.2|143 occurrences
